H0.text: who wrote the song mary had a little lamb. Sarah Josepha Hale

H1.text: who wrote the song mary had a little lamb. Robert Louis Stevenson

H2.text: who wrote the song mary had a little lamb. Eugene Field

H3.text: who wrote the song mary had a little lamb. John Roulstone

A4.text: The earliest evidence of the poem's publication is Sarah Josepha Hale's 1830 collection of poems, supporting her complete authorship of the poem.

A5.text: The 'slip of paper' has never been produced as evidence.
